links.title: Saudi oil giant Aramco may be more profitable than Apple, according to disputed financial leak
links.description: Leaked financial information for the world's largest oil company, Saudi Aramco, reveals one of the most closely held secrets in the energy industry, if the figures are accurate. Saudi Arabia's national oil company earned $33.8 billion in the first half of 2017, according to financial information obtained by Bloomberg News and disputed by the company.

messages.body: $AAPL Has HomePod flopped like the iPhone X and Apple Watch? ... Good use claim chowder. https://www.ped30.com/2018/04/13/apple-homepod-failure-claim-chowder/

links.title: Has HomePod flopped like the iPhone X and Apple Watch? | Philip Elmerâ€‘DeWitt
links.description: I have been saying for months that the HomePod is too expensive and is focusing on features that don't appeal to a mass market...[but] let's not jump to conclusions just yet. iPhone X "failure": Apple Watch "failure": My take: Good use claim chowder. I wish I'd thought of it.
